Shopping Cart: A letter with further instructions will be sent to your email.
Korpa: Pismo sa daljnjim instrukcijama će Vam biti poslato na mejl.

Shopping Cart: You added %1 to your shopping cart.
Korpa: Uspešno ste dodali %1 u vašu korpu.

Shopping Cart: We can't add this item to your shopping cart right now.
Korpa: Trenutno ovaj proizvod nije moguće dodati u vašu korpu.

Shopping Cart: Please select at least one product to add to cart
Korpa: Izaberite najmanje jedan proizvod koji ćete dodati u korpu

Shopping Cart: The quote item isn't found. Verify the item and try again.
Korpa: Navedeni proizvod nije pronađen. Proverite proizvod i pokušajte ponovo.

Shopping Cart: The coupon code "%1" is not valid.
We cannot apply the coupon code.
%1 was updated in your shopping cart.
We can't update the item right now.
Something went wrong while saving the page. Please refresh the page and try again.
Korpa: Došlo je do greške prilikom spremanja stranice. Molimo osvežite stranicu i pokušajte ponovo.

Shopping Cart: We can't update the shopping cart.
The order wasn't placed. First, agree to the terms and conditions, then try placing your order again.
Korpa: Porudžbina nije dovršena. Prvo se složite sa uslovima, a zatim dovršite svoju porudžbinu.

Shopping Cart: Something went wrong while processing your order. Please try again later.
Korpa: Došlo je do greške tokom procesiranja vaše porudžbine. Molimo pokušajte ponovo kasnije.

Shopping Cart: An unspecified error occurred. Please contact us for assistance.
Korpa: Primećena je nedefinisana greška. Molimo kontaktirajte nas za pomoć.

Shopping Cart: Please provide CAPTCHA code and try again
Korpa: Navedite CAPTCHA kod i pokušajte ponovo

Shopping Cart: The product wasn't found. Verify the product and try again.
Korpa: Proizvod nije pronađen. Proverite proizvod i pokušajte ponovo.

Shopping Cart: We found an invalid request for adding product to quote.
Korpa: Pronašli smo neispravan zahtev za dodavanje proizvoda.

Shopping Cart: We don't have some of the products you want.
We don't have as many of some products as you want.

Korpa: Količine su ponovo izračunate iz %1 u %2

Shopping Cart: We adjusted product quantities to fit the required increments.
Korpa: Količine proizvoda smo prilagodili da odgovaraju povećanim zahtevima.

Shopping Cart: This quote item does not exist.
Display number of items in cart
An error occurred on the server. Please try to place the order again.
Korpa: Došlo je do greške na serveru. Pokušajte da ponovo pošaljete porudžbinu.

Shopping Cart: A server error stopped your order from being placed. Please try to place your order again.
Korpa: Greška na serveru je zaustavila porudžbinu. Molimo Vas da ponovo pokušate da poručite.

Shopping Cart: The shipping information was unable to be saved. Error: "%message"
Korpa: Podaci o otpremi nisu uspeli da se sačuvaju. Greška: "%message"

Shopping Cart: The shipping information was unable to be saved. Verify the input data and try again.
Korpa: Podaci o otpremi nisu uspeli da se sačuvaju. Proverite ulazne podatke i pokušajte ponovo.

Shopping Cart: Carrier with such method not found: %1, %2
Korpa: Nosač sa tom metodom nije pronađen: %1, %2

Shopping Cart: The shipping method is missing. Select the shipping method and try again.
Korpa: Nedostaje način dostave. Odaberite način dostave i pokušajte ponovo.

Shopping Cart: The shipping address is missing. Set the address and try again.
Korpa: The shipping address is missing. Set the address and try again.

Shopping Cart: The shipping method can't be set for an empty cart. Add an item to cart and try again.
Korpa: The shipping method can't be set for an empty cart. Add an item to cart and try again.

Shopping Cart: Totals calculation is not applicable to empty cart
Korpa: Totals calculation is not applicable to empty cart

Shopping Cart: The customer address is not valid.
Korpa: The customer address is not valid.

Shopping Cart: There are more than one shipping addresses.
Korpa: There are more than one shipping addresses.

Shopping Cart: Sorry, guest checkout is not available.
Korpa: Sorry, guest checkout is not available.

Shopping Cart: You must confirm your account. Please check your email for the confirmation link or click here for a new link.
Korpa: You must confirm your account. Please check your email for the confirmation link or click here for a new link.

Shopping Cart: You have no items in your shopping cart.
Korpa: You have no items in your shopping cart.

Shopping Cart: You added %1 to your shopping cart.
Korpa: You added %1 to your shopping cart.

Shopping Cart: We'll email you an order confirmation with details and tracking info.
Korpa: We'll email you an order confirmation with details and tracking info.

Shopping Cart: My billing and shipping address are the same
Korpa: Moja adresa za dostavu i plaćanje su iste

Shopping Cart: You can create an account after checkout.
Korpa: Možete kreirati profil korisnika nakon naplate.

Shopping Cart: You already have an account with us. Sign in or continue as guest.
Korpa: Već imate profil kod nas. Prijavite se ili nastavite kao gost.

Shopping Cart: You can track your order status by creating an account.
Korpa: Status vaše porudžbine možete pratiti stvaranjem korisničkog profila.

Shopping Cart: Sorry, no quotes are available for this order at this time
Korpa: Sorry, no quotes are available for this order at this time

Korpa: Provided Zip/Postal Code seems to be invalid.

Shopping Cart: If you believe it is the right one you can ignore this notice.
Korpa: If you believe it is the right one you can ignore this notice.

Shopping Cart: Something went wrong with your request. Please try again later.
Korpa: Something went wrong with your request. Please try again later.

Shopping Cart: Are you sure you want to remove all items from your shopping cart?
Korpa: Are you sure you want to remove all items from your shopping cart?

Korpa: Are you sure you would like to remove this item from the shopping cart?
